price: Dan engkau tidak melakukan balas dendam kepada kami, melainkan karena kami beriman kepada ayat-ayat Tuhan kami ketika ayat-ayat itu datang kepada kami." (Mereka berdoa), "Ya Tuhan kami, limpahkanlah kesabaran kepada kami dan matikanlah kami dalam keadaan muslim (berserah diri kepada-Mu)."
arabic: وَمَا تَنقِمُ مِنَّآ إِلَّآ أَنۡ ءَامَنَّا بِـَٔايَٰتِ رَبِّنَا لَمَّا جَآءَتۡنَاۚ رَبَّنَآ أَفۡرِغۡ عَلَيۡنَا صَبۡرٗا وَتَوَفَّنَا مُسۡلِمِينَ

version.title: Indonesian Translation - Ministry of Islamic Affairs
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by Indonesian Ministry of Islamic Affairs. Notice: Some referred translated verses corrected by Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: wamā tanqimu minnā illā an āmannā biāyāti rabbinā lammā jāatnā rabbanā afrigh ʿalaynā ṣabran watawaffanā mus'limīna
